summary: Are you tired of getting picked on in Skyrim? Here's a little mod that will stop all that, the Hyper Bow is a glass bow that is full of stopping power!!
descriptionHtml: Are you tired of getting picked on in Skyrim? Here's a little mod that will stop all that, the Hyper Bow is a glass bow that is full of stopping power!! I've been on this site for a long time using other peoples great mods, so I thought now would a good time to showcase my own modding talent... Took a glass bow and change the parameters to make it go farther and faster than all the rest!!!
author: UpRiZ3N
